list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: lacking sufficient money to live at a standard considered comfortable or normal in a society.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: people who were too poor to afford a telephone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những người quá nghèo để mua điện thoại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: worse than is usual, expected, or desirable; of a low or inferior standard or quality.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many people are eating a very poor diet
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều người đang ăn một chế độ ăn uống rất kém

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) considered to be deserving of pity or sympathy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they inquired after poor Dorothy's broken hip
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ hỏi sau hông bị hỏng của Dorothy nghèo
